channel.title: NPC Bug: Marines are "good" at throwing frags over railing
channel.description:
So I just bought this game, and I have to say, these marines are really pro at throwing grenades-- they keep throwing grenades over railings towards me, only to have it hit the railing they're trying to throw it over, which makes it rebound off said railing and (usually) land next to the guy who threw it. They don't even try to run away from their own grenade, they just let it detonate next to them. Surprisingly their own grenade doesnt do any damage to them though, or they'd all be dead by now because they can't throw grenades worth crud apparently.
Marines 2 pro for me
Other than that, really good Marine AI.
